title: Android TV’s “expanded” picture-in-picture mode is here with Android 13 Beta 2
content:
During the excitement of a new Android 13 beta release, it’s quite easy to forget that phones (and tablets) aren’t the only things getting upgraded. While the initial Android 13 beta for Android TV was a bit underwhelming, the latest version includes something that users have been wanting for quite a while — a revamped

The post Android TV’s “expanded” picture-in-picture mode is here with Android 13 Beta 2 appeared first on XDA.
description: Android 13 introduces a new expanded picture-in-picture mode that allows developers to create longer and wider PiP windows on Android TV.
